Translations.Text: Oebbi Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep, iwakken yal amdan ad ippuqeiii af wayen ikseb. Nitni ur pwadensen
Twalav win irran lhawiyya s d oebbi is? Itelf it Oebbi, asali $uoeS. Iskweo as ul, timejjin, Irra yas aabouq af allen is. Anwa ara t inhun, deffir Oebbi? Day u la tesmektayem ara
Nnan: "i illan kan, d tudert nne$, di ddunit. A nemmet, a nidir. Ad a$ in$en kan d akud". £ef ayagi, ur sain kra n tmusni. Nitni $ilen kan
Ma mlan asen issekniyen nne£ iberrzen, anamer nnsen, siwa mara d inin: "erret ed imezwura nne$, ma tessawalem tidep
Ini: "Oebbi Issidir ikwen, sinna, Ineqq ikwen. Sinna a kwen Issemlil ass n tnekra, ur illi degs ccekk". Maca, tegwti n yimdanen ur ssinen
